Class MySQLiteOpenHelper

      • edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback.MySQLiteOpenHelper

  • public class MySQLiteOpenHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing Comments. Clients should access the database through CommentsDataSource.
    Author:
    ellen.spertus@gmail.com (Ellen Spertus)
